title: Jimmy Vs Zombies (v1.2.5) -[GIBZ]
description:
This is: Jimmy Vs Zombies (v1.2.5)

Looking forward to the local co-op with this. A mix of TD and SHMUP genres or some stuff... seems like a fun deal! Just install and go for it... no more, no less!!
--------------------------------------

Description:
It's time to keep safe your city from a zombie invasion! 
Take a base of Run and Gun, add some tower defense and shoot'em up elements, 
mix the whole in a funny atmosphere with Retro 2D visuals and a Rock-Metal Soundtrack, and you will obtain : Jimmy Vs Zombies. 
Play it solo, co-op or versus, and get Jimmy's guitar back!! 

Game Modes:
Rush (single or local Co-op), 
Arcade (single or local Co-op), 
Extreme Rush (single or local Co-op) 
Extreme Arcade ( single or local Co-op), 
Versus (local), 
Survive Mission (single or local Co-op), 
Granny Unleashed (single or local Co-op) . 

Features:
-12 Upgrades, unlockable with the gold earned in the game. (lifes, continues, costumes, additional character etc). 
-12 Awards (sort of Achievements) to unlock 
-Local Highscores for each modes 
-Rock/Metal original Soundtrack (mp3 available in the folder "Music").


System Requirements:
OS : Windows Xp or later. 
CPU : 1.0Ghz 
RAM : 1GB 
Graphic-card : DirectX 9.0c, 64Mb, Shader 2.0 
Sound-card : DirectX8.1 compatible 
Playable with : 
Keyboard / Mouse /Gamepad / Arcade-Stick. 
(Gamepad/ or Arcade-Stick are recommended for a better experience) 
In the current version (1.2.5) most of Pc gamepads are supported. (DirectInput and Xinput supported)


--------------------------------------
